content.text: Every salon has a unique personality and a unique set of services to offer…this is how they attract their customers and grow in the highly competitive beauty industry. As a salon owner, you need a distinct style and appeal in order to stand out and impress people. You also need custom-crafted salon signs to accurately capture your uniqueness and showcase it to your target market. Generic, store-bought signage just can’t do that for you.

But a custom-made sign isn’t enough, your business needs a custom-made sign that actually works. And one smart way to get this done is by partnering with an established signs provider like Royal Signs & Awnings. Having been in the sign-making industry for many years now, Royal Signs & Awnings is equipped and experienced to not only provide attractive signs, but to also study your brand and business goals to ensure that you receive the exact signs you need.

We at Royal Signs & Awnings inform, guide, and help you select the most ideal sign types for your salon. If you don’t have a sign design yet, our in-house graphic artists can help you out with that. Our team of sign experts are also ready to fabricate the exact signs that you need. Whether it’s outdoor signs, indoor signs, pole signs, fascia signs, vinyl stickers, illuminated signs, etc., Royal Signs & Awnings delivers it on time and, of course, on budget.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation!
LED Signs for that Neon-Sign Look

Neon signs are one of those signs that many people expect to see in a salon. Unfortunately, neon signs are slowly being phased out and in some states is prohibited because of a couple of reasons including maintenance costs, safety issues, and fragility. The good news, though, is that technology has brought us a safer, more affordable, and more durable, alternative to neon signs…LED signs!

If your salon’s branding is just craving for a splash of neon light, LED signs by Royal Signs & Awnings can be a great solution. Our LED signs can be customized to have the colors that you want. They are made from flame-retardant, flexible, highly durable materials, and some LED strips that can be made waterproof! They are perfect for outdoor signage and can serve as 24/7 advertising tools for your salon.

LED signs won’t cost you much either since they require little power and very low maintenance. They are an excellent long-term signage investment for your business. Give your salon an impressive first impression by investing in Royal Signs & Awnings’s LED signage.

Your building sign says a lot about the business you run. That’s how it works for salons, too. By choosing your fascia signs, you’re also choosing how your customers perceive your brand and your services, and this is why it’s so important to choose them wisely and strategically. Building signs exude a sense of permanence and insinuate your business’s stability.

Royal Signs & Awnings offers a wide selection of building and fascia signs that you can choose from, which is perfect because you want to make sure that the signs you choose are in line with your branding. For a modern, professional look, we can do custom-crafted channel letters and dimensional letters. If you want a more laid back appeal, Royal Signs & Awnings offers blade signs and hanging signs. For more personalized and functional signs, we can give you awning signs.

Royal Signs & Awnings, with our years of experience in the sign industry, knows exactly what it takes to have an attractive sign that clearly conveys your brand message. And we’d love to help you choose the best sign for your salon.

Salons often come with large windows so that passing pedestrians and drivers can have a glimpse of what it’s like inside. These large windows and glass panes, from a sign provider’s perspective, can be very useful. They are great locations for glass and window signs.

Royal Signs & Awnings can give you a lot of options on how you can style your window signs without going against your branding. From window clings, window lettering, window graphics, privacy film, perforated film, and even full-color window posters with high-quality graphics, Royal Signs & Awnings has your salon covered.

We’ve also been in the business long enough to have established a network of sign material suppliers so we can assure you that the vinyl, ink, and adhesive that we use are premium quality. You can always count on Royal Signs & Awnings to maximize your establishment’s space for effective signage.

Royal Signs & Awnings does more than just print out signs for you, we can actually guide you through our entire sign-making process. Our strong team of project managers, graphic designers, fabricators, installers, and marketing specialists are ready to help from conceptualization all the way to maintenance and repair.

We at Royal Signs & Awnings are proud of the work that we do. We have the training, technology, and the experience to deliver excellent quality signage that not only looks good but are effective in giving your business a boost. We start by carefully studying your brand, goals, and budget…and then we work closely with you and/or your marketing team in order to create a signage system that speaks your brand message.

Royal Signs & Awnings has catered to the signage needs of quite a number of salons in the area, and we can’t wait to cater to yours. From creative initial design all the way to strategic installation, we’re ready to give your business the salon signs that get you noticed and get people in through your doors.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation with a Salon Signs Expert!
